DOC.brief_summary: Patients diagnose isolated tear anterior cruciate ligament schedule arthroscopic reconstruction use bone-patellar tendon-bone autograft recruit participate . All subject invite participate 2 week ( 2 supervise session per week ) prior surgery . Each session include supervise therapeutic exercise . Subjects randomly assign receive continuous transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation ( TENS ) session knee joint cryotherapy prior exercise session . The investigator measure quadriceps function 2-week intervention ( session occur prior reconstruction surgery ) . This study also true control group receive either exercise modality intervention . The investigator collect subjective objective outcome data regularly schedule post-operative visit .
DOC.brief_title: Quadriceps Function Prior Anterior Cruciate Ligament Reconstruction
DOC.criteria: 1 . Complete ACL rupture 2 . Age 1555 1 . Persons tolerate knee joint TENS . 2 . Persons know allergy cryotherapy 3 . Patients pregnant plan get pregnant 12month followup period .
